txt.en: In your absence, new threats have come to Angmar. Cánnakh, a scholar in Aughaire, seeks the assistance of a brave hero as he works to uncover a dark secret of the past.
Cánnakh can be found in Aughaire.\n\nYou should speak with Cánnakh.

'Greetings traveller, I am Cánnakh. If you have a moment, I have grave news to tell.\n\n'Creatures from The Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu have made their way out of the shadow and flame and onto the land. They walk in Angmar! I fear they search for something and work for the same cause. I have been researching ancient tales to learn their plan, but I fear they will succeed before I do. I wager there is some sort of ancient power buried in Angmar and these beasts are searching to unearth it. Will you help me by defeating these beasts before Angmar is cast into darkness from their foul plans?'
Cánnakh can be found in Aughaire.\n\nYou should speak with Cánnakh.
Cánnakh requires assistance as Angmar is once again under threat.
